welcome_message_title: Welcome to Sabana de La Mar
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sabana de La Mar, the charming coastal city known for its stunning natural beauty and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the vibrant culture and breathtaking landscapes that make our city a true hidden gem. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arroyo Barril International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Arroyo Barril International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Samaná El Catey International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
